casebody.data:
CHARLES C. BENJAMIN, Administrator, v. KLOTSCH & APPEL, Incorporated, et al. Decided May 4th, 1926.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Pattison, Henee, Oefutt, Digges, Paeke and Walsh, JJ.

David Ash, for the appellant. Albert A. Sapero, for the appellee. Urner, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court, affirming the decree, with costs.
